GSD.description:
HID: hidraw: fix memory leak in hidraw_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.65 by commit dfd27a737283313a3e626e97b9d9b2d8d6a94188. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: hidraw: fix memory leak in hidraw_release()
